page.title: 05RECREATION
page.content: Hyndburn Sports Centre is designed and equipped to cater for the widest possible range of sporting and social activities. Its multi purpose use offers a wide scope of sporting facilities in most areas, a great testimony when one looks at the vast numbers who use the Centre facilities. The centre was opened in l977 by Lancashire and England Cricketer David Lloyd. Many indoor sports are catered for including swimming, karate, squash,badminton, basketball, aerobics, weight lifting and gymnastics. The Centre also has an artificial grass pitch, opened in August l983 which offers soccer, hockey, netball,and tennis. Hyndburn Park Primary School
